body: I had nearly 2000 rep this morning, then ruqqus went down, and when I came back it was down to 1500 something. Now it's at 1190 rep. I checked all of my post/comment history for any massive downvoting causes, but none were to be found. Is this possibly a glitch from the server change, or does a coder of this site hate me?
body_html: I had nearly 2000 rep this morning, then ruqqus went down, and when I came back it was down to 1500 something. Now it's at 1190 rep. I checked all of my post/comment history for any massive downvoting causes, but none were to be found. Is this possibly a glitch from the server change, or does a coder of this site hate me?
title: Anyone else rapidly losing rep even though they didn't get any more downvotes?

body: Yeah, I've lost ~4000 but i think it will all come back when Captain fixes everything...
body_html: Yeah, I've lost ~4000 but i think it will all come back when Captain fixes everything...

body: It appears all the votes on a lot of previous posts have disappeared. That's probably the reason. It seems almost all previous posts on +foxes are affected by this.

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body:
Yep, lost over 200 rep yesterday after the site came back on. A few hours later I lost 200 more, and this morning I had lost 30-40 more.

The votes on posts back to about 10 days ago have also disappeared. Even my own initial vote is no longer registered.
body_html:
Yep, lost over 200 rep yesterday after the site came back on. A few hours later I lost 200 more, and this morning I had lost 30-40 more.

The votes on posts back to about 10 days ago have also disappeared. Even my own initial vote is no longer registered.
